summary: First run E2E testing of SnapVault Events MVP. All 15 backend API tests passed. Frontend tested for auth, dashboard, create event (wedding), event manage page, guest upload flow. All critical flows working.

ui_bugs.issue: Stats cards show '0' for all values during loading state instead of a loading skeleton. Once data loads they update, but initial flash of zeros may confuse users.

issues: Stats show 0 during data load - minor UX concern, no skeleton shown for stats values

action_items: Minor: Add loading skeleton for stats cards values in Dashboard.jsx to avoid flash of 0s
critical_code_review_comments: server.py uses @app.on_event('shutdown') which is deprecated in newer FastAPI - recommend using lifespan context manager
Dashboard stats show 0 during loading - add loading state to stats section
JWT_SECRET has a weak fallback 'dev-secret-change-this' - ensure .env always has a proper secret in production

success_rate.frontend: 90% (all critical flows pass, minor UX issue with stats loading)

seed_data_creation: Test Wedding event 'John & Jane Wedding Test' created via frontend test - may still exist in DB for slug 2849a1a0
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs confirmed working: auth register/login/me, events CRUD, guest upload, media delete. Frontend flows: Login->Dashboard->CreateEvent(3-step wizard)->EventManage->GuestUpload all working. The dashboard event cards use data-testid='event-card-{id}' not 'event-card'. Create Event wizard buttons are 'Choose Template' (step1->2) and 'Event Details' (step2->3) and 'Create Event' (final). Birthday/Corporate event creation and OrganizerGallery page were not fully tested in UI - recommend testing those next.
rca_of_issue: Dashboard stats flash 0 because events state initializes as [] and stats are computed from events array before API response arrives. Fix: add loading guard to stats rendering.
